## MFAContainer.createNewTOTP() method

Creates new time-based one time password (TOTP) MFA authenticator.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createNewTOTP(options: CreateNewTOTPOptions): Promise<CreateNewTOTPResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>CreateNewTOTPOptions</code> | TOTP configuration |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<CreateNewTOTPResult>`
